channel.title: Hearthstone Deck Classification
channel.description: Recent content on Hearthstone Deck Classification

item.title: About the project
item.description: Background: Hearthstone is a massively popular online collectible card game developed by Blizzard Entertainment. Players select a hero from one of ten classes. All classes have unique cards and abilities, known as hero powers, which help define class archetypes. Each player uses a deck of cards from their collection with the end goal being to reduce the opponent’s health to zero. Blizzard releases expansions of additional cards every four months to increase the variety in the metagame.
